A1: the current security situation in Afghanistan
RelatedSentence: ISLAMABAD : A four - star level meeting was held at Afghan Ministry of Defence , Kabul on Monday during which the participants reviewed the current security situation in Afghanistan .

The meeting was attended by Chief of Army Staff ( COAS ) General Raheel Sharif , Afghan Chief of General Staff General Sher Muhammad Karimi and Commander of ISAF General Joseph Dunford , says a press release .

The meeting was attended by Chief of Army Staff ( COAS ) General Raheel Sharif , Afghan Chief of General Staff General Sher Muhammad Karimi and Commander of ISAF General Joseph Dunford , says a press release .
Afghan military officials also briefed the Pakistani delegation over latest security situation in Afghanistan with special emphasis on Afghan Presidential elections .
